experience.description: I have been giving a few English and for the most part Math lessons to high school students. It helped me pay for my studies and I learned patience and how to teach others.

Managed the accounting and documented each bank account movement in our management system. Whenever possible I used my Computer Science knowledge to improve the workflow in the office by making Python scripts or Excel worksheets to facilitate the job. Developed 'downbpiol', a script using Python and the Selenium library to grab important files from a web service.

Worked on 'xForm', a software solution that interfaces with a Synology NAS using the official API and SSH where needed. It allows for easy creation of users and uploading of files, complete with a simple desktop UI. Worked on an user-friendly desktop CRUD application for editing Excel files using Python and pandas.
Managed network configurations and troubleshooted issues within the VMWare cloud stack.
Work on Google cloud functions that fetch data from a Spanner db, written with express API framework and unit tested in nodejs; integration tests with python Behave library for BDD
